title: Google+ will finally die for good in 2023 with ‘Currents’ shutdown
content:
Google+ was Google’s attempt at building a social network, but it was finally shut down in April 2019 due to its unpopularity and API security problems. However, Google+ continued to live on for business accounts as ‘Google Currents’ in G Suite, where everyone in an organization or company could make posts and talk to each

The post Google+ will finally die for good in 2023 with ‘Currents’ shutdown appeared first on xda-developers.
description: The public version of Google+ died in 2019, but now the version for businesses (Google Currents) will wind down starting next year.
